name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium comfort for all-day listening.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, GPS, and smartphone integration in a sleek, waterproof design.

name: Classic Leather Jacket
description: Genuine leather jacket with timeless style, perfect for any season. Made from premium materials with attention to detail.

name: Professional Coffee Maker
description: Brew barista-quality coffee at home with programmable settings, thermal carafe, and precision temperature control.

name: RGB Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting, programmable buttons, and ergonomic design for competitive gaming.

name: Eco-Friendly Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat made from natural materials. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and general fitness exercises.

name: Travel Backpack
description: Durable travel backpack with multiple compartments, laptop sleeve, and water-resistant material for all your adventures.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with multiple brightness levels, USB charging port, and energy-efficient design for your workspace.
